The Facebook post from: Being Liberal" attacked Sens. Marco Rubio and Rand Paul, claiming that they hold certain beliefs about the age of the Earth and the extinction of dinosaurs.
The Facebook meme featured side: by-side images of Rubio and Paul with bolded text describing their alleged views on the age of the Earth and the extinction of dinosaurs.
The post received significant engagement: with over 5,500 likes and more than 4,000 shares.
The expert: s investigation found that the claim about Rubio's beliefs on the age of the Earth stemmed from a 2012 interview in which he discussed the topic, but he later clarified his answer and affirmed the scientific consensus on the Earth's age.
